alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Grand Valley; Lower Yampa River Basin; Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 23 at 5:52AM MDT until June 23 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Colorado, Lower Yampa River Basin, Central Yampa River Basin, Grand Valley, Debeque to Silt Corridor, Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin and Paradox Valley/Lower Dolores River. In Utah, Eastern Uinta Basin and Arches/Grand Flat. * WHEN...From noon to 8 PM MDT today. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Grand Valley; Lower Yampa River Basin; Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River
